18. RETIREMENT BENEFIT PLANS The Corporation adopted a pension plan under the Labor Pension Act (the “LPA”), which is a state-managed defined contribution plan. Under the LPA, an entity makes monthly contributions to employees’ individual pension accounts at 6% of monthly salaries and wages. The Corporation recognized expenses of NT$42,516 thousand and NT$40,686 thousand in the statements of comprehensive income for the years ended December 31, 2017 and 2016, respectively.
